name: Pointless Button (Warning: Pointless!)
description:
This button is really pointless. It's written on it, too.

The game is also pointless and there are NO EASTER EGGS AT ALL!!!!

Note: After 1000 Clicks, your Computer may crash but if you restart, everything's fine. 

(I think.) Good luck and.... DON'T KLICK THE BUTTON. IT'S   //P O I N T L E S S//
